msg: Do not throw a NullPointerException if a JAR file is missing a manifest.

msg: Update the comments in DefaultServlet to describe *why* URL decoding was

author: craigmcc
msg: Refactor the Principal that is synthesized in MemoryRealm into a separate
class that can be reused by other Realm implementations.  Modify
MemoryRealm to use the new class.
